# The dom extension

Configure the `dom` extension.

This extension provides support for operations on XML and HTML through Document
Object Model (DOM).

## EXT_DOM

* Default: `ON`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Enable the extension.

## EXT_DOM_SHARED

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Build extension as shared.
